name: Jeeva Karunya Trust
briefDescription: Jeevakrunya trust GREEN CROSS INDIA  Promotes positive Environmental, Wildlife, Tribal, Sustainable Agriculture (organic Farming) & Renewable Energy news, awareness, action, Conservation, Education & Research committed towards Ecologically Secured Sustainable Developed Society. Motto:  SHE- Save Home EarthVision & Mission Our vision is just Humanity, a Culture & a Development that values & conserves life supporting nature.Our mission is to influence, encourage lead and support younger generations & remote societies
